attributes.additional_details: After the attempted takeover by News Corporation to buy BskyB it goes to show how vulnerable media pluralism is in  the United Kingdom and to mainly stop Media Moguls like Rupert Murdoch taking over our Media to ensure a FREE PRESS for all. Also to call upon the government to strengthen Media ownership laws to ensure there is media pluralism for everyone.  Because at the end of the day Media is made for the people, by the people.
